opticomlib.typing.optical_signal

class opticomlib.typing.optical_signal(signal: list | tuple | ndarray, noise: list | tuple | ndarray | None = None)[source]

optical signal object

Parameters:

  • signal (Union[list, tuple, np.ndarray]) – The signal values. Defaults to None.

  • noise (Union[list, tuple, np.ndarray]) – The noise values. Defaults to None.

If signal or noise are not passed as arguments it will be initialized to zeros((2,N))

signal

The signal values. Shape (2, N).

Type:

ndarray

noise

The noise values. Shape (2, N).

Type:

ndarray

ejecution_time

The execution time of previous device.

Type:

None

__init__(signal: list | tuple | ndarray, noise: list | tuple | ndarray | None = None) → None[source]
